features.featureTitle: Generate a premium, high-resolution dark-mode website background image suitable for an Indian digital banking/fintech UI, using deep navy blue and charcoal tones as the base, subtle accents of blue and white, and very minimal saffron or green highlights; include soft gradients, gentle glow lines, and minimal abstract elements representing finance, growth, digital payments, and secure transactions; ensure the image contains no people, no text, no logos, and no watermarks.

Apply the newly generated dark-mode banking background image across the ArthaNidhi Pay User Portal in dark mode (unauthenticated and authenticated pages), ensuring readable contrast for all primary UI surfaces (cards, tables, form fields, and navigation) while keeping the background subtle and non-distracting.
